p: Sample extraction was done according to the method described by Saura-Calixto, Serrano, and Goñi [ 16]. Briefly 0.4g of dried sample was mixed with 12 ml of acidified methanol water solution (50:50 v/v.pH 2) and extracted for 3 hours. The mixture was centrifuged at 2500 g for 10 minutes and the supernatant was transferred to another test tube. To the residue, 12 ml of acetone water (70:30 v/v) was added and extracted for another 3 hours, centrifugation takes place and the supernatant was mixed with the first extract and stored at 4°C until analysis.
